nodes.text: The Bantha Bottle was a popular piece of merchandise sold at Bantha Traxx on Lianna. It was a small canteen with a hands-free neck strap, emblazoned with the a stylized bantha paw print. Sold at Cooling Stations, the canteen contained vitawater and purchasers were allowed free refills as it was aimed at patrons who attended Bantha Traxx to dance. The Bantha Bottle sold for 10 credits.
